name: Inner Rage
description: Ignite the fires of hate in an enemy's heart, dealing 1199 Magic Damage and taunting them to attack you for 15 seconds.  A ranged ally targeting the taunted enemy can activate the Radiate synergy, dealing 2244 Magic Damage to them over 3 seconds then an additional 2249 Magic Damage to them and other nearby enemies.
effectLines: The synergy will now always apply to the target, instead of having a chance.

A ranged ally targeting the taunted enemy can activate the Radiate synergy, dealing $2 Magic Damage to them over 3 seconds then an additional $3 Magic Damage to them and other nearby enemies.
